source_documents_processed: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram

functional_requirements.source_reference: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram
functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow web, new, and registered customers to browse and view available items.

functional_requirements.source_reference: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram
functional_requirements.description: The system shall provide new customers with a registration interface to create an account by submitting required personal information.

functional_requirements.source_reference: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram
functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow registered customers to initiate the checkout process for the items in their shopping cart.

functional_requirements.source_reference: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram
functional_requirements.description: The system shall enable registered customers to complete a purchase by selecting a payment method (credit card or PayPal) and processing the transaction via the corresponding external service.

functional_requirements.source_reference: Online Shopping System Use Case Diagram
functional_requirements.description: The system shall authenticate customers through an external identity provider before granting access to protected functions.
